languages.text: "Прости, брат, но я вынужден отклонить твое предложение, хоть сердце мое и наполняется радостью от мысли биться с вами". {n}Ульфар достает украшенный алыми рунами нож и взрезает ладонь.{/n} "Я, Ульфар Громогласный, перед Черногривом клянусь кровью Фенриса, что не прекращу искать свою стаю, пока не узрю их живыми или же усопшими".

"Forgive me, brother, but I must decline your offer, though my heart fills with joy at the thought of fighting alongside you." {n}Ulfar draws a knife adorned with scarlet runes and slices his palm.{/n} "I, Ulfar Thunderlung, swear before the Blackmane and by the blood of Fenris that I will not cease to seek my pack until my own eyes behold them, alive or dead."
languages.original_text: "Прости, брат, но я вынужден отклонить твое предложение, хоть сердце мое и наполняется радостью от мысли биться с вами". {n}Ульфар достает украшенный алыми рунами нож и взрезает ладонь.{/n} "Я, Ульфар Громогласный, перед Черногривом клянусь кровью Фенриса, что не прекращу искать свою стаю, пока не узрю их живыми или же усопшими".

traits.locale_text: "Forgive me, brother, but I must decline your offer, though my heart fills with joy at the thought of fighting alongside you." {n}Ulfar draws a knife adorned with scarlet runes and slices his palm.{/n} "I, Ulfar Thunderlung, swear before the Blackmane and by the blood of Fenris that I will not cease to seek my pack until my own eyes behold them, alive or dead."

"Forgive me, brother, but I must decline your offer, though my heart fills with joy at the thought of fighting alongside you." {n}Ulfar draws a knife adorned with scarlet runes and slices his palm.{/n} "I, Ulfar Thunderlung, swear before the Blackmane and by the blood of Fenris that I will not cease to seek my pack until my own eyes behold them, alive or dead."

"Forgive me, brother, but I must decline your offer, though my heart fills with joy at the thought of fighting alongside you." {n}Ulfar draws a knife adorned with scarlet runes and slices his palm.{/n} "I, Ulfar Thunderlung, swear before the Blackmane and by the blood of Fenris that I will not cease to seek my pack until my own eyes behold them, alive or dead."

"Forgive me, brother, but I must decline your offer, though my heart fills with joy at the thought of fighting alongside you." {n}Ulfar draws a knife adorned with scarlet runes and slices his palm.{/n} "I, Ulfar Thunderlung, swear before the Blackmane and by the blood of Fenris that I will not cease to seek my pack until my own eyes behold them, alive or dead."

languages.text: «Lo lamento hermano, pero debo rechazar esta oferta, aunque mi corazón se alegra al pensar en luchar a tu lado». {n}Ulfar saca un cuchillo adornado con runas escarlatas y se hace un corte en la mano.{/n} «Yo, Ulfar Pulmón Atronador, juro ante Melenanegra y por la sangre de Fenris que no dejaré de buscar a mi jauría hasta que los vea con mis propios ojos, estén vivos o muertos».
languages.original_text: "Forgive me, brother, but I must decline your offer, though my heart fills with joy at the thought of fighting alongside you." {n}Ulfar draws a knife adorned with scarlet runes and slices his palm.{/n} "I, Ulfar Thunderlung, swear before the Blackmane and by the blood of Fenris that I will not cease to seek my pack until my own eyes behold them, alive or dead."

traits.locale_text: «Lo lamento hermano, pero debo rechazar esta oferta, aunque mi corazón se alegra al pensar en luchar a tu lado». {n}Ulfar saca un cuchillo adornado con runas escarlatas y se hace un corte en la mano.{/n} «Yo, Ulfar Pulmón Atronador, juro ante Melenanegra y por la sangre de Fenris que no dejaré de buscar a mi jauría hasta que los vea con mis propios ojos, estén vivos o muertos».

languages.text: “请原谅我，兄弟。虽然一想到能与你并肩作战，我的心中就充满了喜悦，但恐怕我不得不拒绝你的好意。”{n}乌尔法拔出一把饰有猩红色符文的小刀，划破了自己的手掌。{/n}“我，‘雷狼’乌尔法，以芬里斯之血向黑鬃起誓：我绝不会停止寻找我的狼群，直到我亲眼见到他们，无论生死。”
languages.original_text: "Forgive me, brother, but I must decline your offer, though my heart fills with joy at the thought of fighting alongside you." {n}Ulfar draws a knife adorned with scarlet runes and slices his palm.{/n} "I, Ulfar Thunderlung, swear before the Blackmane and by the blood of Fenris that I will not cease to seek my pack until my own eyes behold them, alive or dead."

traits.locale_text: “请原谅我，兄弟。虽然一想到能与你并肩作战，我的心中就充满了喜悦，但恐怕我不得不拒绝你的好意。”{n}乌尔法拔出一把饰有猩红色符文的小刀，划破了自己的手掌。{/n}“我，‘雷狼’乌尔法，以芬里斯之血向黑鬃起誓：我绝不会停止寻找我的狼群，直到我亲眼见到他们，无论生死。”

languages.text: 「すまない、兄弟。だがその申し出は断らなければならない。だがあんたと一緒に戦えると思うと俺の心は喜びでいっぱいになる」{n}ウルファー緋色のルーンをあしらったナイフを抜き、掌を切り裂く。{/n}「我、ウルファー・サンダーラングは、生死を問わず、この目で彼らを見るまでは群れを探すことをやめないと…ブラックメインの前で、そしてフェンリスの血にかけて誓う」
languages.original_text: "Forgive me, brother, but I must decline your offer, though my heart fills with joy at the thought of fighting alongside you." {n}Ulfar draws a knife adorned with scarlet runes and slices his palm.{/n} "I, Ulfar Thunderlung, swear before the Blackmane and by the blood of Fenris that I will not cease to seek my pack until my own eyes behold them, alive or dead."

traits.locale_text: 「すまない、兄弟。だがその申し出は断らなければならない。だがあんたと一緒に戦えると思うと俺の心は喜びでいっぱいになる」{n}ウルファー緋色のルーンをあしらったナイフを抜き、掌を切り裂く。{/n}「我、ウルファー・サンダーラングは、生死を問わず、この目で彼らを見るまでは群れを探すことをやめないと…ブラックメインの前で、そしてフェンリスの血にかけて誓う」

languages.text: « Pardonnez-moi, mon frère, mais je dois refuser votre offre, même si mon cœur s'emplit de joie à la perspective de me battre à vos côtés. » {n}Ulfar sort une dague ornée de runes écarlates avant d'en passer la lame sur sa paume.{/n} « Moi, Ulfar Voix-du-Tonnerre, je jure devant Crinière Noire et sur le sang de Fenris que je n'aurai de cesse de chercher mes frères de meute jusqu'à ce que je les retrouve, morts ou vifs. »
languages.original_text: "Forgive me, brother, but I must decline your offer, though my heart fills with joy at the thought of fighting alongside you." {n}Ulfar draws a knife adorned with scarlet runes and slices his palm.{/n} "I, Ulfar Thunderlung, swear before the Blackmane and by the blood of Fenris that I will not cease to seek my pack until my own eyes behold them, alive or dead."

traits.locale_text: « Pardonnez-moi, mon frère, mais je dois refuser votre offre, même si mon cœur s'emplit de joie à la perspective de me battre à vos côtés. » {n}Ulfar sort une dague ornée de runes écarlates avant d'en passer la lame sur sa paume.{/n} « Moi, Ulfar Voix-du-Tonnerre, je jure devant l Crinière Noire et sur le sang de Fenris que je n'aurai de cesse de chercher mes frères de meute jusqu'à ce que je les retrouve, morts ou vifs. »

languages.text: "Vergebt mir, Bruder, doch ich muss Euer Angebot ablehnen, auch wenn der Gedanke, an Eurer Seite zu kämpfen, mein Herz mit Freude erfüllt." {n}Ulfar zieht ein Messer, das mit roten Runen verziert ist, und schlitzt sich die Handfläche auf.{/n} "Ich, Ulfar Donnerlunge, schwöre vor der Schwarzmähne und beim Blut von Fenris, dass ich nicht aufhören werde, mein Rudel zu suchen, bis meine eigenen Augen es erblicken, tot oder lebendig."
languages.original_text: "Forgive me, brother, but I must decline your offer, though my heart fills with joy at the thought of fighting alongside you." {n}Ulfar draws a knife adorned with scarlet runes and slices his palm.{/n} "I, Ulfar Thunderlung, swear before the Blackmane and by the blood of Fenris that I will not cease to seek my pack until my own eyes behold them, alive or dead."

traits.locale_text: "Vergebt mir, Bruder, doch ich muss Euer Angebot ablehnen, auch wenn der Gedanke, an Eurer Seite zu kämpfen, mein Herz mit Freude erfüllt." {n}Ulfar zieht ein Messer, das mit roten Runen verziert ist, und schlitzt sich die Handfläche auf.{/n} "Ich, Ulfar Donnerlunge, schwöre vor der Schwarzmähne und beim Blut von Fenris, dass ich nicht aufhören werde, mein Rudel zu suchen, bis meine eigenen Augen es erblicken, tot oder lebendig."

languages.text: "Affet beni kardeşim ama sizinle savaşma düşüncesi kalbimi neşeyle doldursa da teklifini reddetmek zorundayım." {n}Ulfar, kızıl rünlerle süslenmiş bir bıçak çıkarıp avucunu kesiyor.{/n} "Ben Ulfar Tufanciğer, Karayele'nin önünde ve Fenris'in kanı üzerine yemin ederim ki kardeşlerimi ölü ya da diri görmeden sürümü aramaktan vazgeçmeyeceğim."
languages.original_text: "Forgive me, brother, but I must decline your offer, though my heart fills with joy at the thought of fighting alongside you." {n}Ulfar draws a knife adorned with scarlet runes and slices his palm.{/n} "I, Ulfar Thunderlung, swear before the Blackmane and by the blood of Fenris that I will not cease to seek my pack until my own eyes behold them, alive or dead."

traits.locale_text: "Affet beni kardeşim ama sizinle savaşma düşüncesi kalbimi neşeyle doldursa da teklifini reddetmek zorundayım." {n}Ulfar, kızıl rünlerle süslenmiş bir bıçak çıkarıp avucunu kesiyor.{/n} "Ben Ulfar Tufanciğer, Karayele'nin önünde ve Fenris'in kanı üzerine yemin ederim ki kardeşlerimi ölü ya da diri görmeden sürümü aramaktan vazgeçmeyeceğim."
